channel.title: Signing and jarring a client and cache problems
channel.description: So I know how to jar and sign a client... The problem is that I started with a package (blank pi source + client) now before you say I know pi isn't a client it's a source but what i'm saying is my Raw file and Cache are inside the client folder with all the classes and I don't know how to have them somewhere else i.e. the C: drive now I also know how to write an auto cache downloader so all i need is someone who can help me with my cache problem.. please pm me for my skype details and please please please help me

item.title: Signing and jarring a client and cache problems

item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

signlink cachedir…we will talk on skype later sorry I have been real busy in real life
